attributes.action: Make the non-display of Police ID numbers by Police Officers an act of Gross Misconduct that will result in Disciplinary and Dismissal Procedures.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On-duty Police Officers are required to display unique ID numbers on their uniform that are visible at all times. There is currently no clear penalty for non-conformity with this rule.

We, the undersigned, petition the Cabinet that non-conformity should be regarded as an act of Gross Misconduct and should result in the enactment of the Disciplinary and Dismissal Procedure, according to ACAS guidelines. As an act of Gross Misconduct, it should result in the dismissal of the Officer except in the most extenuating circumstances.
